items.title: FDA Okays Ketamine-Based Med for Post-Surgical Pain
items.description: The FDA has approved the racemic ketamine product KETARx for the management of pain after surgery. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Coronary Sinus Reducer Shows Promise, With Caveats
items.description: In sham-controlled trials, the device appears less beneficial than it has been in single-arm, observational studies. Medscape Medical News

items.title: NHS to Hire Nurses Before Vacancies Exist
